attributes.action: All wedding ceremonies and receptions of up to 90 people
attributes.additional_details: It is unfair to couples who have dreamed of their big day to have to pick which side of the family gets to go to their wedding yet 1000s of people are meeting in city centre to see a you tube star, make weddings back to what they were and give couples their big day
attributes.background: I would like to see the thousands of couples who have stuck to the rules of COVID 19 be able to get married the way they had planned.
